title: OpenSearchDescription.xml
content: ERDDAP The ERDDAP at NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division is a data server that gives you a simple, consistent way to download subsets of scientific datasets in common file formats and make graphs and maps. bob.simons@noaa.gov atmosphere biology biosphere earth environment ocean science ERDDAP http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/nlogo.gif http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa_simple.gif http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa20.gif Bob Simons (bob.simons at noaa.gov) NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division open false en-us UTF-8 UTF-8
raw_content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">
  <ShortName>ERDDAP</ShortName>
  <Description>The ERDDAP at NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division is a data server that gives you a simple, consistent way to download subsets of scientific datasets in common file formats and make graphs and maps.</Description>
  <Url type="application/atom+xml"
       template="http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=atom"/>
  <Url type="application/rss+xml"
       template="http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=rss"/>
  <Contact>bob.simons@noaa.gov</Contact>
  <Tags>atmosphere biology biosphere earth environment ocean science</Tags>
  <LongName>ERDDAP</LongName>
  <Image height="56" width="55">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/nlogo.gif</Image>
  <Image height="313" width="313">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa_simple.gif</Image>
  <Image height="20" width="20">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa20.gif</Image>
  <Query role="example" searchTerms="temperature" />
  <Developer>Bob Simons (bob.simons at noaa.gov)</Developer>
  <Attribution>NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division</Attribution>
  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>
  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>
  <Language>en-us</Language>
  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>
  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>
</OpenSearchDescription>
